randomCoordinates[source]

randomCoordinates(file_csv:Path)

Select andomly a coordinate from a sequence of coordinates. The sequence of coordinates are created from data points stored in a "csv" format file. Data columns: "init_pto_x", "init_pto_y", "expand_x", expand_y"
